name: ALTUVIIIO
indications:
ALTUVIIIO [antihemophilic factor (recombinant), Fc-VWF-XTEN fusion protein-ehtl] is a von Willebrand Factor (VWF) independent recombinant DNA-derived, Factor VIII concentrate indicated for use in adults and children with hemophilia A (congenital factor VIII deficiency) for:
                  
                     Routine prophylaxis to reduce the frequency of bleeding episodes
                     On-demand treatment and control of bleeding episodes
                     Perioperative management of bleeding
contraindications: For intravenous use after reconstitution only.
adverseReactions: ALTUVIIIO is contraindicated in patients who have had severe hypersensitivity reactions, including anaphylaxis, to the product or its excipients [see Description (11)].
